text: Thank you, Sacred Heart Church, for making our Holy Week so special. We were on holiday in Singapore, but attending the Masses here felt like home. The beautiful sermons, warm community, and sacred atmosphere touched my heart deeply. Grateful for the inspiring homilies and welcoming spirit!"
Felt like home when I first stepped into this beautiful and cozy Church. Very warm and welcoming parishioners. So grateful to be baptised with my husband here.

I attended the Friday Mass and the devotion to Sacred Heart of Jesus for the first time and totally captivated by the whole service, such love and dedication to Jesus! Such a beautiful church and the people are so welcoming and loved my whole time there!

Beautiful church
Very vintage look
Not crowded.

Large size church with plenty of seatings with choir.  It's a mix between modern building and old ornamental, eg: stain glass windows.

A nice and peaceful place for a mass.

Visited for Christmas service a couple years ago, and photos included.
